name: Key
description: The Order can proclaim victory if it holds at least 3 Keys.

name: Goblet
description: The Brotherhood can proclaim victory if it holds at least 3 Goblets.

name: Bag of Secrets
description:
Trade this object and you can draw the top object from the 
draw pile. You cannot trade this for another Bag of Secrets. 
This bag turns into a Key as soon as all objects have been drawn.

name: Bag of Secrets
description:
Trade this object and you can draw the top object from the 
draw pile. You cannot trade this for another Bag of Secrets. 
This bag turns into a Goblet as soon as all objects have been drawn.

name: Dagger
description:
Add +1 to your score in any duel if you are the attacker. 
You cannot use this bonus if you are supporting another player.

name: Gloves
description:
Add +1 to your score in any duel if you are the defender. 
You cannot use this bonus if you are supporting another player.

name: Poison Ring
description:
You win any duel that ends in a tie if you are either the 
attacker or the defender. You cannot use this bonus if you are 
supporting another player.

name: Throwing Knives
description: If you support the attacker in any duel add +1 to his score.

name: Whip
description: If you suport the defender in any duel add +1 to his score

name: Tome
description:
Trade this object and you can exchange your profession with 
your trading partner. Turn these professions face-down if they 
were face up.

name: Monocle
description:
Trade this object and you can look at your trading 
partner’s Secret Society card.

name: Privilege
description:
Trade this object and you can look at all of your trading 
partner’s objects.

name: Coat
description:
Trade this object and you can choose a new profession 
from those left over. Place your new profession face-down 
in front of you and add the old one to those left over.

name: Sextant
description:
Trade this object and you can choose a direction 
(right or left). All players must then pass one object of 
their choice to their neighbor in the chosen direction.

name: Shattered Mirror
description:
You must always accept this object if offered in a trade. 
You cannot use the trade ability of any object you exchange 
for the Shattered Mirror

name: Black Pearl
description:
You must always accept this object if offered in a trade. 
If you hold the Black Pearl you cannot proclaim victory for 
your Secret Society.

name: Seal of the Lodge
description:
You can proclaim yourself the sole winner if you hold the 
Seal of the Lodge and at least 3 Keys and/or Goblets
